name: ZoomCar, Inc.
description: ZoomCar, Inc. is a leading player in the car rental and shared mobility sector, focusing on providing innovative and flexible transportation solutions. Founded in 2013 in India, ZoomCar has revolutionized the way people experience mobility by offering self-drive car rental services that cater to a diverse customer base, from individual travelers to corporate clients. The company operates in several major cities, allowing users to rent vehicles ranging from economical hatchbacks to luxury sedans and SUVs, all through a user-friendly mobile app. By leveraging technology, ZoomCar enables a seamless booking process, transparent pricing, and 24/7 customer support. The company is also committed to sustainability and has introduced electric vehicles (EVs) into its fleet, catering to the growing demand for environmentally friendly transportation. ZoomCar's mission is to democratize car access and promote shared mobility, ultimately aiming to reduce traffic congestion and environmental impact. With a strong focus on customer experience, innovative technology, and sustainability, ZoomCar is positioned to lead the future of urban mobility.

seo.meta_title: ZoomCar, Inc. | Self-Drive Car Rentals and Mobility Solutions
seo.meta_description: Explore ZoomCar, Inc., a leader in self-drive car rentals and shared mobility services. Discover their innovative approach to urban transportation and commitment to sustainability.

faq.question: What services does ZoomCar offer?
faq.answer: ZoomCar offers self-drive car rentals, corporate rentals, and subscription services.

faq.question: Who is the CEO of ZoomCar?
faq.answer: Greg Moran is the CEO of ZoomCar, Inc.

faq.question: Where is ZoomCar headquartered?
faq.answer: ZoomCar is headquartered in Bangalore, India.

faq.question: What types of vehicles can I rent from ZoomCar?
faq.answer: ZoomCar offers a variety of vehicles including economical hatchbacks, luxury sedans, and electric vehicles.
